The photo was originally shared on Faceb: 2020, and claims to show a quote by Filipino politician Vico Sotto, the mayor of Pasig city.
The text overlay on the photo suggests t: referring to him as a liar, rapist, mass killer, and thief.
The claim is proven to be false through: which revealed that the photo was originally published in an Inquirer report about Sotto's remarks on Pasig city's coronavirus assistance program. The original quote in the photo is unrelated to Duterte.
Sotto himself issued a statement on Janu: 2021, debunking the claim and warning about the prevalence of fake news on social media. Local news organizations also debunked the misleading claim.
